text: Hontōni shinkō o kyohi shita mono,(hitobito o) arrā no michi kara samatageru mono, soko (makka) no kyojū-shadearou to, gairai-shadearou to subete, ware ga hitobito no tame ni konryū shita seinaru masujido (ni hairu koto) o kyohi suru mono, soshite sono Chū de shinsei o yogoshi fugi o takuramu mono ni wa, ware wa itamashī chōbatsu o aji wa serudearou
